abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats qualifier Tim Smyczek in five sets in second round at Australian Open; praises Smycek for his sportsmanship after he signaled that Nadal should be allowed to replay a first serve in final game of match after a fan's catcalls disrupted him.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal defeated the qualifier Tim Smyczek in five sets, but what left Nadal most impressed was Smyczek’s sportsmanship after a fan disrupted Nadal’s serve late in the final set.
snippet: Rafael Nadal defeated the qualifier Tim Smyczek in five sets, but what left Nadal most impressed was Smyczek’s sportsmanship after a fan disrupted Nadal’s serve late in the final set.

headline.main: Another Loss for Nice Guys; This One Wins Praise
headline.seo: Rafael Nadal Praises Tim Smyczek’s Sportsmanship in Close Match
headline.print_headline: Another Loss for Nice Guys; This One Wins Nadal’s Praise
